Hi everybody
I am using the equilibrate routine but for some conditions I get such
an error:

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Finding equilibrium for point 175...
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/didomax/bin/equil_theta.py", line 165, in ?
    g.equilibrate('HP') # find equilibrium conditions
  File
"/home/didomax/lib/python2.3/site-packages/Cantera/ThermoPhase.py",
line 264, in equilibrate
    _cantera.thermo_equil(self._phase_id, ixy)
cantera.error: 

************************************************
                Cantera Error!                  
************************************************


Procedure: equilibrate
Error:   Cannot find an acceptable Newton damping coefficient
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

for the following conditions:
       temperature             300  K
          pressure          100000  Pa
           density          1.1562  kg/m^3
  mean mol. weight         28.8396  amu

                          1 kg            1 kmol
                       -----------      ------------
          enthalpy         1908.41        5.504e+04     J
   internal energy        -84581.7       -2.439e+06     J
           entropy          6895.8        1.989e+05     J/K
    Gibbs function    -2.06683e+06       -5.961e+07     J
 heat capacity c_p         1010.43        2.914e+04     J/K
 heat capacity c_v         722.126        2.083e+04     J/K

                           X                 Y   
                     -------------     ------------
                H2   1.126706e-12     7.875644e-14
                 H   0.000000e+00     0.000000e+00
                 O   0.000000e+00     0.000000e+00
                O2   2.072924e-01     2.300000e-01
                OH   0.000000e+00     0.000000e+00
               H2O   0.000000e+00     0.000000e+00
                N2   7.927076e-01     7.700000e-01


Two questions:
- to me, the solution is trivial (Tequil = 300K, composition
unchanged); why have I problems?

- I am using Python interface, how can I catch this error?

I would like to add the for the following conditions:
       temperature             300  K
          pressure          100000  Pa
           density          1.1562  kg/m^3
  mean mol. weight         28.8396  amu

                          1 kg            1 kmol
                       -----------      ------------
          enthalpy         1908.41        5.504e+04     J
   internal energy        -84581.7       -2.439e+06     J
           entropy          6895.8        1.989e+05     J/K
    Gibbs function    -2.06683e+06       -5.961e+07     J
 heat capacity c_p         1010.43        2.914e+04     J/K
 heat capacity c_v         722.126        2.083e+04     J/K

                           X                 Y   
                     -------------     ------------
                H2   3.032071e-13     2.119409e-14
                 H   0.000000e+00     0.000000e+00
                 O   0.000000e+00     0.000000e+00
                O2   2.072924e-01     2.300000e-01
                OH   0.000000e+00     0.000000e+00
               H2O   0.000000e+00     0.000000e+00
                N2   7.927076e-01     7.700000e-01

I have not problems at all...

Thanks
